techmeme.title: Ireland's DPC ends court proceedings against X after it agreed to limit its use of personal data collected from EU users to train its AI on a permanent basis (Reuters)
Safe Superintelligence, co-founded by ex-OpenAI chief scientist Ilya Sutskever, raised $1B from a16z, Sequoia, and others, sources say at a $5B valuation (Reuters)
Filing: Lyft plans to sell some of its bike and scooter business and cut 1% of its employees as it struggles to turn profitable (Natalie Lung/Bloomberg)
People who got access to OpenAI's SearchGPT say it struggled with some shopping and local queries, and sometimes presented untrue or hallucinated information (Washington Post)
Cortex, which sells an internal developer portal for teams making software, raised $60M from Sequoia, Stripe co-founders, and others, at a $470M valuation (Katie Roof/Bloomberg)
